cons: They make us come to work in pandemic times.

review_title: Poorly managed, unsafe hospitals, do not recommend
pros: Hospital Rolberto Gilbert (pediatric hospital), some of the best doctors in Ecuador, almost every specialty and subspecialty, surgery
cons: It's all about money, critically ill patients in Luis Vernaza's emergency department will not be attended until they pay $200-400, doctors spend time turning patients away because they can't pay, management doesn't care about employees, unsafe for patients at the Women's Hospital and at Hospital Luis Vernaza.

pros: Stability, company values. Exist some and good profesional people
cons: Slow promotions, slow at my point of view
